ARABIC: هَٰذَا هُدًى وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ بِـَٔايَٰتِ رَبِّهِمْ لَهُمْ عَذَابٌ مِّن رِّجْزٍ أَلِيمٌ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: This is guidance. And those who reject the Signs of their Lord will have a punishment of agonising pain.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: This is guidance. Those who deny the revelations of their Lord will suffer a dreadful doom.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: This (Qur'an) is the true guidance. Those who deny the Signs of their Lord shall suffer the torment of a woeful scourge.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: This (Quran) is a guidance. Those who reject the revelations of their Lord will suffer the most painful punishment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: This is the (true) guidance; and for those who disbelieve in the verses of their Lord is the severest of painful punishments.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: This is guidance. And those who disbelieve in the Ayat of their Lord, for them there is a painful torment of Rijz.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: This is guidance; and (as for) those who disbelieve in the communications of their Lord, they shall have a painful punishment on account of uncleanness.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: This is guidance; and those who disbelieve in the signs of their Lord, there awaits them a painful chastisement of wrath.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: This is guidance. And those who disbelieve the revelations of their Lord, for them there is a painful doom of wrath.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Such is Our guidance; those who reject their Lord's revelations shall suffer a woeful punishment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: This Book is guidance, and those who disbelieve in the revelations of their Lord, theirs shall be torment of calamity, afflictive.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: This is [true] guidance, and there is a painful punishment due to defilement for those who defy the signs of their Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: This is (true) Guidance and for those who reject the Signs of their Lord, is a grievous Penalty of abomination.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: This (Quran) is a guidance. And those who disbelieve in the Ayat (proofs, evidences, verses, lessons, signs, revelations, etc.) of their Lord, for them there is a painful torment of Rijz (a severe kind of punishment).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: This is guidance; for those who disbelieve in the verses of their Lord the anger of the painful punishment awaits them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: This is guidance. Those who blaspheme their Lord’s revelations will have a punishment of agonizing pain.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: This [Qur'an] is guidance. And those who have disbelieved in the verses of their Lord will have a painful punishment of foul nature.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [45:11] This, that is, the Qur’ān, is a guidance, from error; and those who disbelieve in the signs of their Lord, for them there will be a torture, a lot, of a painful, an excruciating, chastisement.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (This) i.e. this Qur'an (is guidance) from error. (And those who disbelieve the revelations of their Lord) those who disbelieve in Muhammad (pbuh) and the Qur'an, i.e. al-Nadr Ibn al-Harith and his host, (for them there is a painful doom of wrath) for them there is a painful punishment.
